00017 enum _SRecordDefinitions {
00018         /* 768 should be plenty of space to read in an S-Record */
00019         SRECORD_RECORD_BUFF_SIZE = 768,
00020         /* Offsets and lengths of various fields in an S-Record record */
00021         SRECORD_TYPE_OFFSET = 1,
00022         SRECORD_TYPE_LEN = 1,
00023         SRECORD_COUNT_OFFSET = 2,
00024         SRECORD_COUNT_LEN = 2,
00025         SRECORD_ADDRESS_OFFSET = 4,
00026         SRECORD_CHECKSUM_LEN = 2,
00027         /* Maximum ascii hex length of the S-Record data field */
00028         SRECORD_MAX_DATA_LEN = 64,
00029         /* Maximum ascii hex length of the S-Record address field */
00030         SRECORD_MAX_ADDRESS_LEN = 8,
00031         /* Ascii hex length of a single byte */
00032         SRECORD_ASCII_HEX_BYTE_LEN = 2,
00033         /* Start code offset and value */
00034         SRECORD_START_CODE_OFFSET = 0,
00035         SRECORD_START_CODE = 'S',
00036 };
